name: Rocksteady Studios
detail: Rocksteady Studios Limited is a British video game developer based in Kentish Town, London. Founded in November 2004, they are best known for their work in the Batman: Arkham series. The company is a subsidiary of Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, with a 74.9% ownership, while Square Enix Europe owns the remaining 25.1%.
